title: A Plague Tale: Innocence

description: One of the pioneering survival horror games that set the standard for the genre.

description: A multiplayer game where crewmates try to complete tasks while impostors try to eliminate them.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the dystopian future of Night City in this highly anticipated open-world RPG.

description: A multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a killer while the others try to escape.
